Articles.Content:
Some people park a "guide vessel" at the end of the runway that they can target. Something super tiny with a light and a probe core.

Flags are cheaper.

Also if you hit it, you don't damage anything... except the flag.

Edited October 7, 2014 by Alshain
I'm trying to build a bomber with the new parts... let's just say I've been seeing a lot of unintentional explosion effects.

Thanks Squad!

Oh boy, patching now, and looking forward to all the kewl stuff you guys added!

Flags are cheaper.

Also if you hit it, you don't damage anything... except the flag.

Actually that's a really good idea, don't know why I didn't think of it. I do like the runway floodlights, though.
The HypePlane is far behind us now. Here's a song for the hypeTrain.

The HypePlane is far behind us now. Here's a song for the hypeTrain.

Is that you singing?

No, it specifically refers to docking from what I saw. Again, not sure if that's a new thing.

According to HarvesteR, it refers to the vessels you land without the intention of moving them afterwards. BaseConstruction is achieved by docking while landed in each celestial body.

According to HarvesteR, it refers to the vessels you land without the intention of moving them afterwards. BaseConstruction is achieved by docking while landed in each celestial body.

Yeah, that's exactly what the code looks like. I've just never seen it before, thought it was interesting.

I'm having a problem. None of the KSP downloads are working for me. I have restarted the internet, and hopped on a couple others with no success. It keeps saying this:

Warning: session_start(): The session id is too long or contains illegal characters, valid characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and '-,' in /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php on line 9

Warning: session_start(): Cannot send session cookie - headers already sent by (output started at /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php:9) in /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php on line 9

Warning: session_start(): Cannot send session cache limiter - headers already sent (output started at /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php:9) in /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php on line 9

Warning: Cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php:9) in /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/multiplayDwn.php on line 11

Invalid Token
The island airport got an updated model!
Anybody else still got extremely slow DL speeds?

Downloaded the update from Steam in ~30 seconds. Yes, seconds, but that's what you get when you combine Steam's seemingly infinite download speeds with a 10MB/s internet connection.

I have now witnessed the amazing new explosion effects...and stranded Bill on the Mun in career mode in doing so

Only 'problem' so far was every single setting reverting to normal, but that was noted at least 6 pages ago. Had to restart the game to apply the texture settings, but now everything is back to the way it was, and Engineer is functioning perfectly without an update. Sleep is no longer important.

screenshots of the new airport

the whole place has an abandoned look to it now.
What are these achievements you speak of regex????
finaly starting

I'm having a problem. None of the KSP downloads are working for me. I have restarted the internet, and hopped on a couple others with no success. It keeps saying this:

That's on or end. Server butt kickage. Please be patient. Thanks.

What are these achievements you speak of regex????
According to HarvesteR, it refers to the vessels you land without the intention of moving them afterwards. BaseConstruction is achieved by docking while landed in each celestial body.

It's not "Achievements" like Steam achievements, if that's the confusion.

anyone else missing turbojet engines?
